ygData.subject: Video Card? and  What is twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: How is everybody? Looking forward to the holidays? I have been considering using some of my soon to be (hopefully) newfound Christmas wealth to purchase a
ygData.messageBody:
How is everybody? Looking forward to the
holidays? I have been considering using some of my soon to
be (hopefully) newfound Christmas wealth to purchase
a video card. Does anyone out there have any
suggestions of a good card for EQ? Right now I'm leaning
toward a Voodoo 5. Expensive but I figure do it right
the first time, and you get what you pay for and all
that junk. I'd really appreciate some more input and
suggestions though. As for what is twinking, I guess there
are different levels. It all depends on how much you
are willing to take from one of your characters to
give to another. I don't think I'm against twinking
either. The way I see it someone had to go through the
process of being a naked newbie at some point, if they
want to give their hard earned cash and equipment to
another character that's their perogative. I think for me
it might take away from the enjoyment of earning the
stuff myself, but on the other hand... Boy I wish I had
a lot of Cool Stuff! Happy Hollidays everyone!
